targets.query:
from(bucket: "main")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp_measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] == "birdbox-ctrl")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "temperature")

from(bucket: "main")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "humidity_measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "humidity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] == "birdbox-ctrl")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "humidity")

from(bucket: "main")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "max_volume_level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "audio_analysis")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] == "birdbox-ctrl")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")
  

from(bucket: "main")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "volume_level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "audio_analysis")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] == "birdbox-ctrl")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "level")

from(bucket: "main")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "min_volume_level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "audio_analysis")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] == "birdbox-ctrl")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: min, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "min")

from(bucket: "main")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean_volume_level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "audio_analysis")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] == "birdbox-ctrl")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "image_analysis")

  |> yield()
